resources.string: Hours from now vs temperature (degrees Celsius)
Hours from now vs probability of precipitation (percent)
Hours from now vs air humidity (percent)
Fields - this part of the app allows the user to create \'field\' objects, which are displayed with physical data (from the pi)
Weather - this part of the app accepts a city as input and outputs a short-term weather forecast for that city
Pi data - this part of the app is what links to the Raspberry Pi (via bluetooth) and stores data received from it
Click to see the raspberry pi data gathered about this field

Hello!

For more information about this project go to our website here (sorry i do not know how to hyperlink): https://pi-drate.github.io

If you are interested, the code for our project can be found here: https://github.com/henry314159/EcoMonitor4

Thank you for supporting our project!
